title: Input Files
content:
The first step of Text Capture is to create input files, user can either create input files Here or go to File manager. Input files should confirm to this format.

In Create Input step, you have 3 different ways to create input files.

title: Create Files
content:
1. Create a subfolder or Select an existing subfolder.
2. Click Create Files in New Folder button, and follow the instruction to create input files.

title: Upload Files
content:
1. Create a subfolder or Select an existing subfolder.
2. Click Upload files button to upload input files.

title: Select Existing Folder
content: Select an existing subfolder, all files in this subfolder will be used as input files.
